title: CUBE NURIDE HYBRID Pro 750 Allroad - Electric Bike - 2023 - black / metal A01
description:
CUBE NURIDE HYBRID Pro 750 Allroad - Electric Bike - 2023 - black / metal A01

 

No surprises – we check every bike!

Due to the current supply situation, components fitted on Cube Bikes are subject to change. Alternative components will offer the same price / quality level.

The components we list in our data sheet are the components you will have on your new bike. Deviations from components originally listed by Cube will be marked in a different colour.

Important: the product photos will differ from the actual bike in these cases!

 

What will next weekend bring?

Combining the go-anywhere ability and comfort of a mountain bike with the ease of use of a city bike and the adaptability of a tourer, the CUBE Nuride Hybrid Pro Allroad truly is a bike for all reasons. Its powerful fourth-generation Bosch CX drive – with Smart System and 625Wh or 750Wh battery – works seamlessly with Shimano's reliable and easy-to-use Deore 10-speed gears, so you can make light work of any journey.

There's a comfortable 100m suspension fork and grippy Schwalbe tyres, with strong hydraulic disc brakes so that you can stop safely in any weather. Mudguards and lights mean you're all set. And, with a wide choice of frame styles and sizes, it's simple to find the perfect fit.

Features of CUBE NURIDE HYBRID PRO Allroad:

  • Aluminium Superlite frame
  • Gravity Casting Technology
  • Agile Comfort Geometry
  • Full integrated battery
  • Kickstand/fender/carrier mounting points
  • Integrated cable routing

FactSheet.v: CUBE NURIDE HYBRID Pro 750 Allroad - Electric Bike - 2023 - black / metal A01
Bosch 4A charger | fenders | Easy bell | kickstand
CUBE Shiny 50 Lux / ACID Mudguard Rear Light PRO-E

title: CUBE NURIDE HYBRID EXC 625 Allroad - Electric Bike - 2023 - polarsilver / black A01
description:
CUBE NURIDE HYBRID EXC 625 Allroad - Electric Bike - 2023 - polarsilver / black A01

 

No surprises – we check every bike!

Due to the current supply situation, components fitted on Cube Bikes are subject to change. Alternative components will offer the same price / quality level.

The components we list in our data sheet are the components you will have on your new bike. Deviations from components originally listed by Cube will be marked in a different colour.

Important: the product photos will differ from the actual bike in these cases!

 

Expand your horizon.

CUBE don't think you should compromise – on your ride plans, or your bike. The Nuride Hybrid EXC Allroad's components are all about reliable performance, from the fourth-generation Bosch CX drive unit to the Shimano Deore 12-speed gears and powerful hydraulic disc brakes. A wide choice of frame sizes and configurations, plus an adjustable stem for the Easy Entry option, means it's easy for you to find the perfect fit.

CUBE included all the accessories you're likely to need, from mudguards and lights to kickstand. Combined with grippy Schwalbe tyres and a smooth, comfortable 100mm air suspension fork, it's your passport to adventurous exploring. 

Features of CUBE NURIDE HYBRID EXC Allroad:

  • Aluminium Superlite frame
  • Gravity Casting Technology
  • Agile Comfort Geometry
  • Full integrated battery
  • Kickstand/fender/carrier mounting points
  • Integrated cable routing

title: CUBE KATHMANDU HYBRID SLX 750 - Electric Touring Bike - 2023 - green / olive A01
description:
CUBE KATHMANDU HYBRID SLX 750 - Electric Touring Bike - 2023 - green / olive A01

 

No surprises – we check every bike!

Due to the current supply situation, components fitted on Cube Bikes are subject to change. Alternative components will offer the same price / quality level.

The components we list in our data sheet are the components you will have on your new bike. Deviations from components originally listed by Cube will be marked in a different colour.

Important: the product photos will differ from the actual bike in these cases!

 

Probably the most versatile bike you've ever owned. 

Fully equipped for anything that life – or adventures – can throw your way, the CUBE Kathmandu Hybrid SLX 750 sets the bar higher. With its fourth-generation Bosch CX drive unit and high-capacity 750Wh battery, it's got the power to take you further than ever.

Shimano's reliable XT 1x12 gears put a huge range of hill-devouring ratios at your fingertip, and powerful four-piston XT hydraulic disc brakes help keep you safely in control in any weather.

The RockShox Recon Silver air fork, suspension seatpost and adjustable stem are all there to ensure your comfort. With elegant and tough Integrated Carrier 3.0 and full complement of included accessories.

Features of CUBE KATHMANDU HYBRID SLX 750:

  • Aluminium Superlite frame
  • Gravity Casting Technology
  • Efficient Comfort Geometry
  • Full integrated battery
  • Internal cable routing
  • Integrated carrier

title: CUBE STEREO HYBRID 120 Pro 750 - Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - flashgrey / orange A01
description:
CUBE STEREO HYBRID 120 Pro 750 - Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - flashgrey / orange A01

 

No surprises – we check every bike!

Due to the current supply situation, components fitted on Cube Bikes are subject to change. Alternative components will offer the same price / quality level.

The components we list in our data sheet are the components you will have on your new bike. Deviations from components originally listed by Cube will be marked in a different colour.

Important: the product photos will differ from the actual bike in these cases!

 

It's all you need for trail adventures.

With the CUBE Stereo Hybrid 120 Pro, comfortable, ground-hugging suspension combined with intuitive handling and reliable, fuss-free performance are all part of the deal. CUBE combined Bosch's fourth-generation CX drive unit and a 625Wh battery with Shimano's legendarily easy-to-use Deore 1x12 gears for simple trail-taming power.

Then CUBE added four-piston hydraulic disc brakes with oversized rotors front and rear. Combined with Schwalbe's grippy 2.6in tyres, they'll ensure you're always in control. And RockShox suspension front and rear keeps the rubber side down.

Features of CUBE STEREO HYBRID 120 Pro:

  • Aluminium Superlite frame
  • Size-Split
  • Agile Comfort Geometry
  • Efficient Comfort Control
  • Boost148
  • FSP4 Link
  • Internal cable routing
  • Fully integrated battery
  • Kickstand/fender/carrier mounting points

FactSheet.v: CUBE STEREO HYBRID 120 Pro 750 - Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - flashgrey / orange A01

title: CUBE KATHMANDU HYBRID Pro 750 - Electric Touring Bike - 2023 - flashgrey / metal A01
description:
CUBE KATHMANDU HYBRID Pro 750 - Electric Touring Bike - 2023 - flashgrey / metal A01

 

No surprises – we check every bike!

Due to the current supply situation, components fitted on Cube Bikes are subject to change. Alternative components will offer the same price / quality level.

The components we list in our data sheet are the components you will have on your new bike. Deviations from components originally listed by Cube will be marked in a different colour.

Important: the product photos will differ from the actual bike in these cases!

 

You're set up to take any journey in your stride. 

The CUBE Kathmandu Hybrid Pro is all about the freedom of two-wheeled exploration... with a handy Bosch power boost. Comfortable, versatile and adaptable, its fourth-generation Bosch CX drive system and high-capacity battery is just the beginning. CUBE chose an X-Fusion air suspension fork with lockout for its ease of adjustment, then added a suspension seatpost and an adjustable stem – so you'll be more comfortable, even on longer rides and rougher roads.

Shimano's Deore 1x11 gears provide a huge range and easy, fingertip shifting. With full complement of included accessories and Integrated Carrier 3.0.

Features of CUBE KATHMANDU HYBRID PRO 750:

  • Aluminium Superlite frame
  • Gravity Casting Technology
  • Efficient Comfort Geometry
  • Full integrated battery
  • Internal cable routing
  • Integrated carrier

title: CUBE STEREO HYBRID 140 HPC TM 750 - Carbon Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - flashgrey / olive A00
description:
CUBE STEREO HYBRID 140 HPC TM 750 - Carbon Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - flashgrey / olive A00

Your ticket to mountain adventures.

You can tell the CUBE Stereo Hybrid 140 HPC TM 750 has tough trails in its sights. A Fox 36 Performance fork up front, paired with a Fox Float X Performance piggyback shock at the rear, delivers point-and-go rock-devouring precision. The light-but-tough Newmen wheelset, shod with Maxxis Assegai 2.5in and Minion DHR II 2.4in tyres, will help keep you rolling.

Powerful Magura MT7 brakes keep your speed in check, on demand. And CUBE paired Bosch's fourth-generation CX drive unit with SRAM's wide-ranging GX Eagle transmission for fingertip shifting and seamless drive. CUBE even included a remote dropper post. Because who knows what obstacle the next trail will throw your way...

Features of CUBE STEREO HYBRID 140 HPC TM:

  • C:62 Monocoque Advanced Twin Mold Technology
  • Size-Split
  • Agile Trail Geometry
  • Efficient Trail Control
  • Boost148
  • FSP4 Link
  • Integrated cable routing
  • Full integrated battery
  • Mounting points for bottle cage

FactSheet.v: CUBE STEREO HYBRID 140 HPC TM 750 - Carbon Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - flashgrey / olive A00
C:62 Monocoque Advanced Twin Mold Technology | Aluminium 6061 T6 Rear Triangle
Maxxis Assegai 2.5" EXO+ / Maxxis Minion DHR II 2.4" DD

title: CUBE STEREO HYBRID 120 Pro Allroad 750 - Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - flashgrey / orange A00
description:
CUBE STEREO HYBRID 120 Pro Allroad 750 - Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - flashgrey / orange A00

If there's a journey with this bike everything is possible!

 A bike for all seasons and many reasons: that's the CUBE Stereo Hybrid 120 Pro Allroad. CUBE included mudguards to help keep spray at bay in bad weather, and a luggage carrier for the daily commute or an extended weekend tour. There's even a kickstand and lights. A 130mm RockShox fork and rear shock with 120mm of travel smooth the ride and, thanks to the Comfort Geometry, you'll be right at home even for long days in the saddle.

Powered by Bosch's proven fourth-generation CX drive unit and Shimano's precise, wide-ranging 1x12 Deore gears, there's also the reassurance of powerful four-piston Shimano hydraulic disc brakes.

Features of CUBE STEREO HYBRID 120 Pro Allroad:

  • Aluminium Superlite frame
  • Size-Split
  • Agile Comfort Geometry
  • Efficient Comfort Control
  • Boost148
  • FSP4 Link
  • Internal cable routing
  • Fully integrated battery
  • Full equipped

title: CUBE SUPREME HYBRID ONE 500 - Easy Entry Electric Bike - 2023 - grey / grey A00
description:
CUBE SUPREME HYBRID ONE 500 - Easy Entry Electric Bike - 2023 - grey / grey A00

It's got your name all over it.

The CUBE Supreme Hybrid ONE is the Bosch-powered e-bike that you never knew you needed, but will wonder how you ever managed without. From its elegant Easy Entry frame with semi-integrated luggage carrier to its carefully chosen components, it's designed so you can just get on and go.

The Bosch drive unit works seamlessly with Shimano's reliable, easy-to-use 7-speed hub gears to make light work of any journey. Powerful Shimano hydraulic disc brakes and Continental urban tyres help keep you safe in any weather. And CUBE have included an integrated rear light, kickstand and an adjustable stem, too.

Features of CUBE SUPREME HYBRID ONE 500:

  • Aluminium Superlite frame
  • Comfort Ride Geometry
  • Smooth Welding
  • Integrated cable routing
  • Fully integrated battery
  • Full equipped

title: CUBE STEREO HYBRID 140 HPC Race 750 - Carbon Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - grey / chrome A00
description:
CUBE STEREO HYBRID 140 HPC Race 750 - Carbon Electric Mountainbike - 2023 - grey / chrome A00

Everything you need to tackle any mountain trail.

Big days out demand a reliable frame and components. That's why, for the Stereo Hybrid 140 HPC Race 750, CUBE starting point was a RockShox 35 Silver Air fork and matching Deluxe Select+ shock plugged into a carbon main frame. Combined with tenaciously grippy Schwalbe 2.6in tyres, SRAM DB8 four-piston hydraulic brake calipers with mineral oil, and a remote dropper post, they're what you need to tackle anything the trail throws your way with complete confidence.

Add fourth-generation Bosch CX power with Shimano's super-reliable XT 1x12 gears, and you've got the complete package to make light of any mountain trail. 

Features of CUBE STEREO HYBRID 140 HPC Race:

  • C:62 Monocoque Advanced Twin Mold Technology
  • Size-Split
  • Agile Trail Geometry
  • Efficient Trail Control
  • Boost148
  • FSP4 Link
  • Integrated cable routing
  • Full integrated battery
  • Mounting points for bottle cage

title: CUBE ACID bracket for KIOX
description:
CUBE ACID bracket for KIOX

The ACID handlebar mount developed especially for the KIOX display offers even more ways to customise your ride. Thanks to its 2-piece construction and asymmetrical design, the display can either be mounted centrally for convenient visibility or next to the stem for a sportier look.

Features of the CUBE ACID Halterung für KIOX

  • handle bar mount for Bosch KIOX display
  • two mounting options:
    option 1: centered ahead stem;
    option 2: sideways along stem; angle adjustment

Included in delivery: 1 bracket
Manufacturer item code: 93071
Weight supplement: manufacturer´s specs

FactSheetObj.Product Name: CUBE ACID bracket for KIOX

title: CUBE Bottle Cage HPP Sidecage - matt black´n´glossy black
description:
CUBE Bottle Cage HPP Sidecage - matt black´n´glossy black

Even in the roughest terrain, the water bottle remains in place thanks to the new design and the material used. Due to the lateral access, the Sidecage also fits perfectly for small frames of E-Bikes. So your botttle can be reached quickly and safely. Matching the Cube frame, the bottle cage is the eye-catcher on your bike.

Features of the CUBE bottle cage HPP Sidecage:

  • optimized geometry for easy handling and secure hold of the bottle
  • side access, perfect for small frame sizes
  • 20 mm slotted hole for the best position on the frame
  • color selection matched to CUBE product range
  • weight: approx. 40 g (manufacturer's specification)

title: CUBE ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29 Inch - black
description:
CUBE ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29 Inch - black

The ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29" is a slimline, minimalist take on stylish practicality. It's the easy way to attach panniers for extra load-carrying capacity. And it's retrofit compatible with the ACID Top RAIL RILink to add even more cargo volume plus the RILink interface. This luggage carrier is compatible with CUBE bikes with 29in wheels and the SIC frame interface.

FactSheet.v: CUBE ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29 Inch - black

FactSheetObj.Product Name: CUBE ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29 Inch - black

title: CUBE ACID E-MTB Crankarms - ISIS
description:
CUBE ACID E-MTB Crankarms - ISIS

 

An important component in drivetrain system

The flat design of the ACID E-MTB crank arms not only perfectly matches the modern design language of today's bikes, but also makes them especially torsion-resistant so that every watt of power is efficiently converted into propulsion.

The lightweight aluminium crank arms come feature a 13 mm an offset and an ISIS mount, which makes them compatible with 4th generation Bosch drivetrains.

 

Weight: approx. 470 grams (pair, manufacturer's specs)

Content of delivery: 1 pair of crank arms incl. crank bolts and spacers

FactSheetObj.Product Name: CUBE ACID E-MTB Crankarms - ISIS

title: CUBE ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29 Inch BOOST - black
description:
CUBE ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29 Inch BOOST - black

The ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29" BOOST is a slimline, minimalist take on stylish practicality. It's the easy way to attach panniers for extra load-carrying capacity. And it's retrofit compatible with the ACID Top RAIL RILink to add even more cargo volume plus the RILink interface. This luggage carrier is compatible with CUBE bikes with 29in wheels, Boost standard and the SIC frame interface.

FactSheet.v: CUBE ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29 Inch BOOST - black

FactSheetObj.Product Name: CUBE ACID Carrier SIC RAIL 29 Inch BOOST - black

title: CUBE PERFORMANCE Stem - 31.8 | E-MTB - black
description:
CUBE PERFORMANCE Stem - 31.8 | E-MTB - black

The Cube Performance stem was manufactured particularly stable to meet the tough conditions at the e-MTB. It is suitable for fork steerers with a diameter of 1 1/8 inches and is available in different lengths. With an angle of 12 degrees, it adapts optimally to the needs of the rider.

Technical details of the Cube Performance stem

  • specially developed for E-MTB's
  • diameter steerer tube: 1 1/8"
  • stem angle: 12°
  • available lengths: 40 - 80 mm

FactSheetObj.Product Name: CUBE PERFORMANCE Stem - 31.8 | E-MTB - black

title: CUBE ACID Panniers TOP TUBE VIEW CMPT - black
description:
CUBE ACID Panniers TOP TUBE VIEW CMPT - black

The TOP TUBE VIEW CMPT stows all your essentials within easy reach directly from the saddle.

The bag attaches to your frame quickly and easily using the touch fasteners, while the large smartphone compartment with touchscreen foil is ideal for navigating using your smartphone. From the city streets to a weekend tour, it's the perfect practical addition.

Features of CUBE ACID Panniers TOP TUBE VIEW CMPT:

  • abrasion-resistant outer material
  • PVC-free
  • reflective elements
  • three touch-fasteners for maximum hold on the frame
  • extension strap for e-bikes included
  • rain cover
  • integrated compartment with touchscreen foil for all mobile phones up to max. 17 x 8.5 cm
  • large window 17 x 9,0 cm

FactSheet.v: CUBE ACID Panniers TOP TUBE VIEW CMPT - black

FactSheetObj.Product Name: CUBE ACID Panniers TOP TUBE VIEW CMPT - black

description:
CUBE ACID Panniers FRAME BAG FULLY PRO 1 - black

Water-repellent 0.5 litre frame bag

The FRAMEBAG FULLY PRO 1 carries all your tour essentials for you. Individually adjustable straps mean it adapts to your frame, while the reflective logo adds visibility in all conditions.
